California's state treasurer, Bill Lockyer , today denounced ongoing efforts to establish a new framework for states to restructure their debts, saying no state wanted or needed to declare bankruptcy. It's a cynical proposal, intended to incite a panic in response to a phony crisis, Mr. Bill Lockyer said in a conference call with journalists.`` Killer bees, space aliens, and now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states.''
